title: Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved - Steam Cracked
description:
Created from a english steam version, that I paired with PROViSiONs Steam.dll from HL2: Episode One. 

This version (at least for me) fixes all the sound corruption issues I had with the BAKA release, plus you can now enable AA. It runs perfectly for me under WinXP SP3, and it was reported to work under Vista.

Just extract to a folder and run the EXE, no install needed.
I have included the BAKA EXE so if the new version does not work, or you want to see the difference, just rename the EXEs
